newsitem.title: CHINA: China unemployment at 3.0 pct at end-March.
newsitem.headline: China unemployment at 3.0 pct at end-March.

text.p: China's urban unemployment rate stood at 3.0 percent at the end of March, State Statistical Bureua spokesman Qiu Xiaohua said on Friday.
A total of 5.3 million urban residents were without jobs at the end of March, Qiu said.
China announced no jobless rate for 1996, but the rate stood at 2.98 percent at the end of September last year.
Beijing has said it expects unemployment to rise in 1996 and has forecast the rate at between three percent and 3.5 percent in 1997.
